name: Goblin
description: Goblins are small, black-hearted humanoids that lair in caves, abandoned mines, despoiled dungeons, and other dismal settings. They are cowardly and will flee from a fight that they can't win.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Fury of the Small
traits.description: When you damage a creature with an attack or a spell and the creature's size is larger than yours, you can cause the attack or spell to deal extra damage to the creature. The extra damage equals your level. Once you use this trait, you canâ€™t use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

effects.condition: against a creature larger than you (once per short rest)

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.description: You can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of your turns.
